short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove tracking information from the current page and automatically copy the URL to your clipboard.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Sanitize It lets you quickly remove tracking and referral data that is embedded in URLs with a single click. 

• One Click Tracking Removal: Instantly strip out tracking information from URLs (i.e. turn a URL like https://sanitizeit.xyz/?utm_source=share&utm_medium=social into https://sanitizeit.xyz).
• Clipboard Integration: Automatically copies sanitized URLs to your clipboard for easy sharing.
• Easy to Use: Simply click the Sanitize It extension and instantly sanitize the URL of the page you're on. 

Sanitize It is fully open-source and available on GitHub: https://github.com/sethcottle/sanitize-it/
